title: (x) Nectar Cafe - Koch Antique {Mike Y}
content:
Can anyone identify the fonts used on this sample? Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nectar.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042237/http:/typophile.com/files/nectar.jpg) | 8.26 KB |
author: evan

comments.content:
I think this is a version of Koch Antiqua, possibly the [Linotype one](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042237/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/koch-antiqua/koch-antiqua/testdrive.html?s=nectar+cafe&p=48), or maybe [Letrasetâ€™s Locarno](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042237/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/locarno/light/testdrive.html?s=nectar+cafe&p=60)

- Mike Yanega

Mike

My vote goes to Koch Antiqua, thank you. Also thank you for your website with all the samples of script fonts. It is very helpful.

Also thank you for your website with all the samples of script fonts.

That sure is a very valuable resource indeed. :^)
